children.text: Players may use official Riftbound cards of any language as long as their deck contents match the following:
All cards within the same deck or subset that can be shuffled together or drawn from randomly must be the same language. For example:
All cards in a player’s Main Deck and sideboard must be the same language as each other. Your Chosen Champion is a Main Deck card.
All cards in a player’s Rune Deck must be the same language as each other.
A player’s Legend can be a different language than their Main Deck or Rune Deck.
A player’s battlefields can be a different language than their Main Deck or Rune Deck.
A player may call a judge at any time to get the Watcher wording for any card in the language of their preference.
